concept.title: 5627.7004 Requirements for Filing an Administrative Claim for Patent Infringements.

conbody.p: (a) All contracting offices shall acknowledge receipt of patent right allegations and then forward a copy of the documents to SOF AT&L-KM/KX/KB as appropriate, and legal counsel.
HQ, United States Special Operations Command
Special Operations Forces Acquisition, Technology, and Logistics (SOF AT&L)
